detectors.description:
Cvp._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#277-288) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#280)
detectors.markdown:
[Cvp._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#L277-L288) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#L280)

detectors.description:
Cvp.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#176-185) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,Cvp::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#183)
detectors.markdown:
[Cvp.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#L176-L185) uses timestamp for comparisons

detectors.description: Constant Cvp.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#30) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

Cvp.slitherConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#19-316) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 100000000e18 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#30)

detectors.description:
delegate(address) should be declared external:
	- Cvp.delegate(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cvp.sol#163-165)

getPriorVotes(address,uint256) should be declared external:
